document.full_text: mexico's most violent city, ciudad juarez, where more than 9,000 people have died in a horrifying drug war since 2008, is renaming itself heroica ciudad juarez, or heroic city of juarez.
document.title: mexican drug war capital renames itself "heroic"
lines_and_colors: mexico's most violent city, ciudad juarez, where more than 9,000 people have died in a horrifying drug war since 2008, is renaming itself heroica ciudad juarez, or heroic city of juarez.
